subdisciplines.name: Science and Technology Studies
subdisciplines.description: The study of the social and cultural dimensions of science and technology, including their development, distribution, and use.

subdisciplines.name: Information and Communication Technologies
subdisciplines.description: The study of the social and cultural impacts of information and communication technologies, including the internet, social media, and mobile devices.

subdisciplines.name: Medical Sociology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the social factors that influence health and illness, including the organization and delivery of healthcare.
